A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Disney is milking Mark Hamill's sea cow with this new SW trilogy by poorly repeating the first episodes all over again (Albeit\, with new tech). Rian Johnson's TLJ is just the nail in the coffin: bad acting from many (but not all) characters\, ridiculous script and plot\, the list goes on for a while (just read any of the posts here). The only positive note was the visual spectacle and the score\, so I can see Disney's SW becoming a new \"Transformers-like saga\" under Rian Johnson's leadership\, which is not necessarily a bad thing... but as Mark Hamill pointed out: \"Just because a film makes a lot of money doesn't mean it's a great film\". Touché.
